t:
“                                             the time when school gets over and I wait for my Mom to come pick me up”, thought the little girl as she stood in front of the gate of the primary school.
“But I don't understand why that
middle aged man is looking at my chest, his eyes leering all over my body.”
c:
“Why won't he leave me alone?”
Somewhere, someone is thinking the same. What can you do to make them feel otherwise?
